job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using and improving existing AI systems for customer support rather than developing or engineering AI models. While it mentions AI training and fine-tuning, the core responsibilities are application support and integrating human expertise with AI, not core AI development.

phrases.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates understanding the nature of customer issues and how they are handled by AI, which relates to understanding the business process of customer support.

phrases.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
phrases.justification: This requires understanding the limitations of the AI system within the business context of customer support and applying human knowledge to bridge that gap.

phrases.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
phrases.justification: This directly relates to understanding how to combine different capabilities (human and AI) to achieve a business goal (exceptional customer support).

phrases.phrase: improving the AI system
phrases.justification: Suggests involvement in enhancing the AI's performance, which could indirectly involve model adjustments.

phrases.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
phrases.justification: Directly mentions involvement in the process of adjusting or improving AI models.

phrases.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
phrases.justification: This implies experimentation with and evaluation of AI technologies, which is related to the modeling aspect, though not necessarily building from scratch.

phrases.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
phrases.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools often involves some level of software development or integration to evaluate their functionality.

phrases.phrase: improving the AI system
phrases.justification: Enhancing an AI system's performance in production can be considered an operational task.

phrases.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback
phrases.justification: Feedback loops are crucial for monitoring and improving deployed AI systems, aligning with MLOps principles.

phrases.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems
phrases.justification: Requires analytical skills to understand and resolve complex issues.

phrases.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
phrases.justification: Demonstrates problem-solving by addressing limitations.

phrases.phrase: improving the AI system
phrases.justification: Indicates a proactive approach to problem resolution and system enhancement.

phrases.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
phrases.justification: Suggests an experimental and problem-solving approach to finding better solutions.

phrases.phrase: expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
phrases.justification: Highlights the need for rapid learning and problem-solving to meet aggressive timelines.

phrases.phrase: if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
phrases.justification: Directly emphasizes the importance of self-sufficiency and problem-solving.

phrases.phrase: expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
phrases.justification: Indicates a need for rapid learning and adaptation to new products and systems.

phrases.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
phrases.justification: Suggests a willingness to learn and adapt to emerging AI technologies.

phrases.phrase: improving the AI system
phrases.justification: Suggests taking initiative to enhance existing systems.

phrases.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
phrases.justification: Demonstrates a proactive and innovative approach to exploring new solutions.

phrases.phrase: if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
phrases.justification: Implies a need for ownership and self-direction in problem-solving.

phrases.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback
phrases.justification: Requires clear communication to convey feedback on AI outputs.

phrases.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
phrases.justification: Implies collaboration with AI specialists or engineers.

phrases.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities
phrases.justification: Suggests collaboration between human and AI components, and potentially with teams managing them.
